ISSUE.TITLE: Grouped product redirect uses 302 instead of 301
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: When you go to a product page by using a child product's SEO name, nop redirects to the parent product's page with a 302 code, which is a temporary redirect. Using a permanent redirect instead generally makes more sense for SEO purposes. I'll put together a pull request that adds a setting that controls whether a 301 or a 302 is used for the redirect.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4117 For group products, the default should always be request redirection with code 301
